##### Q1. Total Trips

```{r q1-bluebiketrips, echo=false}

q1 <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cheryltky/bikeshare_studies/main/csvdata/Q1.csv", sep=",")
head(Q1)
str(Q1)
```

```{r plot-month-year-bluebikes}
bluebikes <- ggplot(data= Q1, aes( x= month_year, y=trips_bluebike))+
  geom_line(color ="orange")

bluebikes
```
